title: Signs And Symptoms Of Long Covid
content:
post-intensive care syndrome (PICS)
. While PICS is not specific to infection with SARS-CoV-2, the virus that causes COVID-19, it may occur and contribute to the person's experience of Long COVID. Health effects from PICS may begin when a person is in an intensive care unit (ICU), and can include:
Muscle weakness
Problems with thinking and judgment
Symptoms of
post-traumatic stress disorder
(PTSD)
